title: Matchmaking in Normals
body:
http://www.bilder-upload.eu/show.php?file=23c026-1451240295.png

JUST LOOK AT THIS (pay attention to the janna, not even lvl 30)
THATS NO FUN, it happens too often, it is ruining the game experience, normals are no place to relax anymore because u gotta carry the unrankeds, defeats everywhere, JUST WTF ARE U SMOKING TO ALLOW THIS RIOT, fix this

replies.body:
There is no need to fix anything the normal mmr and the ranked mmr are completlie different. So when a Dia player plays like 4 normalgames in a year his mmr is realy low. On the other hand is it possible that the lvl 29 char is a smurf, who maybe is dia in her main anyway.
P.s. look at my elo and at my last normal appounents.
(sry for the grammar ^^)
you should read the information thread about MMR. (and btw this is the german forum)
